Author: pothosgonerogue
Text: I just got the most beautiful purple baby lacinato from one of my friends and if it wasn’t so delicious I’d never eat and just admire it.   I worked in restaurants for almost ten years and now I manage a farmers market so most of my safe meals are a locally grown rainbow on top of some oatmeal.   My friend that did the granola just gave me some beetroot and apple and it’s the prettiest color. And delicious like holy shit. Her granola is the one of my typical scary foods, but I’ve never binged on it. Just a small amount on my breakfast every day. I figure if I’m eating for keeps its going to be pretty and delicious.

Author: m_melly
Text: I dont mean to trigger u at all. But we stan a diverse food group queen. I can imagine all of the colors!
